titleStmt.title: Covent Garden drolery, or A colection [sic] of all the choice songs, poems, prologues, and epilogues, (sung and spoken at courts and theaters) never in print before. Written by the refined'st witts of the age. And collected by A.B.
titleStmt.author: A. B.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for James Magnes neer the Piazza in Russel-Street,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: Covent Garden drollery.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
